page.title: 17Tourism
page.content: Many{tourists}seem to be attracted to this block. In fact on a Saturday morning in July and August it is often difficult to cross the A.39 as it enters Williton. The{tourist attractions}are generally of the quiet and relaxing nature. The{coastline}is flat and covered with interesting rock pools and bounded by cliffs containing many fossils. The{areas of hills and {woods}make excellent walking or picnicing country. There is also the opportunity to have a ride on a steam train by courtesy of the West Somerset Railway. There are two major{Holiday Camps } within this block and another large permanent{Caravan Park. }Many of the farmers supplement their income by either doing{Bed and Breakfast}or by hiring out land for{caravans or}tents.
